hadiths.text: A'isha (Allah be pleased with her) reported that a man said to Allah's Apostle (ﷺ):My mother died all of a sudden, and I think if she (could have the opportunity) to speak she would have (made a will) regarding Sadaqa'. Will I be entitled to reward if I give charity on her behalf? He (the Holy Prophet) said: Yes

chapter.ara-name: باب وُصُولِ ثَوَابِ الصَّدَقَاتِ إِلَى الْمَيِّتِ
chapter.eng-name: The Reward For Charity Reaches The Deceased
